questionTitle: I can't work today. It's ____ hot.
I'd like to buy those shoes, but they are ____ expensive.
We need another ladder. This one isn't long .
I can't do this exercise because it's ____ difficult.
Nobody bought my bike because it's ____ old .
We had to change rooms because our room wasn't big ____.
John didn't win the race because his car wasn't fast ____.
Don't play near the railway line. It's ____ dangerous.
Pam couldn't reach the top shelf because she wasn't tall ____.
I'm sorry, but your work isn't good ____.
